channel.title: Hugo on Hugo Profile
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Hugo Profile

item.title: Cretaing a website
item.description: Creating a website can be a thrilling yet daunting task. As someone who wanted to establish an online presence, I embarked on a journey to build my own website using Hugo, a popular open-source static site generator. In this blog post, I will share my approach, experiences, and the lessons I learned throughout the process. 1. Understanding the Basics Before diving into Hugo, I took some time to understand the fundamental concepts of static site generators and how they differ from dynamic websites.
